requirement.ratioDescription: Apprentice utilization requirements on public works projects
requirement.statute: New York Labor Law Article 8, Section 220
requirement.notes: New York requires apprentice utilization on prevailing wage projects. Building trades councils often set specific ratios through collective bargaining.

iraFederalRequirement.ratioDescription: 15% apprentice labor hours on IRA/IIJA-funded clean energy projects over $1 million
iraFederalRequirement.notes: Federal requirement for enhanced clean energy tax credits. Applies nationwide regardless of state law. Began 2023, percentage increases over time.
